title: 5 New Nova Launcher Tips & Tricks (2017!)
description:

But since then, nova launcher has released new features. So, I decided to make an updated video for you guys. Enjoy!

[Video content]

1. Quickly find Your apps
2. Get App Shortcuts Like the Pixel

4. Use Gestures like a pro
5. See images with the dynamic badges
